Welcome to ND2 SDK’s documentation!¶

nd2reader¶

class nd2reader.ND2reader(pathIn)¶

Class to read ND2 files

ND2reader is a class to read ND2 files created by a Nikon microscope. The class uses the official ND2 SDK libraries.

Example:
>> from nd2reader import ND2reader >> R = ND2reader(“path/to/file.nd2”)

Parameters: path_to_file (str): Path to the ND2 file

newFunction()¶

Does nothing

Just a test for Sphinx
